title: Rek'sai skin soon possibly please?
body: I just though since Rek'sai was released she has been my favorite champ, her skin out atm is nice but its plain. any skins planned for the future? so many possibilities for skins!

replies.body:
Bro, there are a bunch of champs that have been out for ages and haven't had a new skin. There are three that I think are worth a mention and from oldest to youngest they are:

- {{champion:83}} Yorick
- {{champion:154}} Zac
- {{champion:238}} Zed

All the above champions have not been given skins since their release and I think are well overdue. So your Rek'Sai can just wait until the above champions have been sorted out.
